title: Blended Instructional Motivation Design Master Course Based on ARCS Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of instructional design and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Enhancing blended teaching design competencies in social studies for in-service elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Design three types of ARCS theory-based lesson modules that improve learning engagement by 20% or more
Develop 15 or more mobile-optimized microlearning contents
Acquire proficiency in using MMBCI-based assessment tools for measuring learner motivation
Complete one classroom-ready instructional design plan through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
